title: Need for Speed Font
content:
Looking at 2 fonts here, one for the text "Need for Speed" and the other for "Street" (don't really care for the PRO font).

I suspect that the R in STREET may be custom?

[http://www.wiitalia.it/cover.php?src=http://www.wiitalia.it/immagini/cov...](http://web.archive.org/web/20111229202844/http:/www.wiitalia.it/cover.php?src=http://www.wiitalia.it/immagini/cover/wii/need-for-speed-pro-street-big.jpg "http://www.wiitalia.it/cover.php?src=http://www.wiitalia.it/immagini/cover/wii/need-for-speed-pro-street-big.jpg")
author: joejohnson9182

comments.content:
"NEED FOR SPEED" looks like Serpentine Bold Oblique with the flare serifs shaved off.

[http://new.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/serpentine/](http://web.archive.org/web/20111229202844/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/serpentine/)

I would guess that both "PRO" and "STREET" are custom lettering.
I bet the R in Street is custom with that little gap in the middle. But the rest of it looks like something pretty typical...
Anyone wanna take a stab at something close for the STREET text? I hoping to get something at least close to it!

<cite>"NEED FOR SPEED" looks like Serpentine Bold Oblique with the flare serifs shaved off.</cite>

You don’t have to do that yourself! There’s a [Serpentine Sans](http://web.archive.org/web/20111229202844/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/imageclub/serpentine-sans/?testdrive=dock%3Dfalse%26size%3D28%26w%3D720%26src%3Dcustom%26text%3DNEED%2520FOR%2520SPEED%26fg%3D000000%26bg%3Dffffff%26goodies%3Dfit%26seed%3D33). ;-)

<cite>Anyone wanna take a stab at something close for the STREET text? I hoping to get something at least close to it!</cite>

[http://new.myfonts.com/tags/grotesk/](http://web.archive.org/web/20111229202844/http:/new.myfonts.com/tags/grotesk/ "http://new.myfonts.com/tags/grotesk/")
